name: detox
description: Detox - A cross-platform library for Haxe to make working with Xml and the DOM easy... similar to jQuery and friends, but works wherever Haxe works, in a more haxe-like way.
releasenote: Better support for loops and defining loops inline in your templates.  See git commits for more info.  Some bug fixes too. Probably will be the last version before I do a major refactor to use Abstracts instead of 'using' mixins, so compatibility may break after this version.
